work_experience.title: Work Experience
work_experience.description: Here are some of the companies I've worked for and the projects I've worked on.

1.description: Developed backend functionalities for a Foreign Exchange System using Java, Spring MVC, and MySQL. Additionally, I was involved in automated testing and stress testing using Apache JMeter. I also participated in the optimization of the bank background system and used related technologies such as JSP, AJAX, JQuery, and Java.

2.description: Independently developed an Overwolf application that automatically recognizes and records gaming highlights, allowing users to easily share clips on social media platforms. I uses React, Redux, Tailwind CSS and TypeScript technology to develop this application. The application has been downloaded over 4,000 times and has more than 250 daily active users at its peak. The client is currently planning to pre-install this app on their own PC devices and integrate it with more related applications.
